name: Straight Arm Circles
instruction: Stand straight with your feet shoulder-width apart. Raise and extend your left arm to the side, without bending the elbow. Slowly rotate your arm forward, making big circles. Complete a set in one direction and then switch, rotating backward.
hints: Stand with your spine nice and tall, inhale as you lift your arm, and exhale as you rotate your arm around. Remember to engage your core muscles and keep your back and arm straight. Keep the rotation slow and controlled.
